column4: hey guys, so I am looking for an ftp that I can use on the cli. any suggestions?
first suggestiojn.. why are you using ftp in this day in age... why not ssh/scp/sftp ?
theres tools that can do ftp in the cli. one is 'ftp' :) another is 'mc' (midnight commander)
thers no ftp server installed by default.
